document_data.name: Limmator
document_data.mainbody: '''Limmator''' was a lordling in [[Galadorna]] during the mid-8{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Rumors & Legends: After reporting on the murder of the trader [[Anlavas Jhoavryn]] in [[Nethra]] during the year {{yearlink|767}}, the watch captain [[Rhoagalow]] confided in seneschal [[Elminster Aumar]] that he believed Baron Limmator was behind that killing. Elminster didn't seem to disagree; Limmator's reputation was such that he was said to be the only lordling busier with shady doings than [[Maethor]].
